name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
schedule:
1. 授課大綱及考試評分規定
2. Electronic Structure, Bonding, and Acids and Bases
3. An Introduction to Organic Compounds: Nomenclature
4. An Introduction to Organic Compounds:Physical Properties, and Representation of Structure
5. 第一次考試, Alkene
6. Alkene: Nomenclature, Thermodynamics and Kinetics
7. The reaction of Alkenes
8. 第二次考試, Stereochemistry
9. Stereochemistry
10.The reaction of Alkynes
11.第三次考試,
12. Delocalization and Molecular Orbital Theory
13. Substitution Reactions of alkyl Halides
14.Substitution Reactions of alkyl Halides
15.第四次考試
16.Elimination Reactions of Alkyl Halides
17.Elimination Reactions of Alkyl Halides
18.期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry
Paula Yurkanis Bruice
6th Ed.
